Package controllers

package controllers
  • Klassen
    Klasse
    Beschreibung
    AccountManager
    A utility class for managing the currently logged-in account.
    ChatComponent
    A simple chat UI component using Swing.
    CreateController
    Controller class for creating a new game room.
    DeleteController
    Controller for deleting user accounts.
    EditController
    Controller class responsible for editing user account credentials.
    GameBoardController
    Fully functional controller for the GameBoard.
    GameRoomController
    Controller class responsible for managing game room operations.
    JoinController
    Controller for handling user actions related to joining a game room.
    LobbyController
    Controller class for the lobby view.
    LoginController
    Controller for handling user login and registration navigation.
    RegisterController
    Controller responsible for user registration UI logic.
    SceneSwitching
    Utility class for switching between JavaFX scenes.
    WinController
    This class handles the display of player rankings, scores, and provides navigation back to the game lobby.
